attributes.action: send uk troops into zimbabwe to protect anybody that needs protection from the mugabe regime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: wherever people are being tortured and murdered to gain or keep power or possession of a country we need to intervien in the strongest way,hopefully together with the rest of the world.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
